name: AhmadShayan1112/Telegram-OpenAI-Signal-Bot - GitHub
snippet: This project is a Telegram bot integrated with OpenAI's GPT-3.5 to provide automated trading signals and insights from top Telegram groups. It scrapes messages containing trading signals, categorizes them (Forex, Gold, Crypto), and provides structured trading data using AI-powered analysis.
